messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Labor Shuttle Dock.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Bloody floors simulator 2k18. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Bloody floors simulator 2k18, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: THERE WILL BE A PARTY AT SCIENCE

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a swarm of [REDACTED] have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chemistry.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: JANET AT CENTCOM IS BEING A BITCH! EVERYONE RANT ABOUT IT! SHE'S NOT SENDING PARTY SUPPLIES!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: GET BACK TO SCIEEENCE AND MOOOOSH

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: NEW AND IMPROVED VERSION WILL INLCUDE MED BOTS

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: OK MEDI BOTS ARE HERE COME MOSH UNLESS YOUR A PUSSY GET IN THERE AND BUTT HEADS OOOH YEAAAAA

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
